html:
Project Management (CSR)

This course offers a hands-on approach to project management, and provide students the opportunity to work on real industry case. In team, students are immersed in real working condition, setting goal, timelines, developing the project content as well as monitoring progress and performance. Students are also trained on management techniques to face and settle conflicts effectively and challenges from internal and external stakeholders.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Set project vision, goal and specifications.

+  Prepare a feasibility study based on project vision & goal.

+  Prepare Gant charts and monitor work progress.

+  Use key techniques to manage internal and external stakeholder.

+  Apply problem solving techniques to ensure project progress.

Module Content:
